title: UC lagging
body:
I am in UCSD and fps is 130 and 60-61ms.
All of my friends are experiencing that lagging and even those in UCI are experiencing the same.
What can we do to reduce lagging cz sometimes that ruins the game when I play ADC or Mid lane.
{{item:3151}}

replies.body:
This higher ping could be due to a few factors, or even a more local issue or setting with your PC.  To start off, have you reached out to your campus IT to see if there might be any updates that have changed how you're routing through the campus network?  

Grab [WinMTR ](http://winmtr.net/winmtr-v0-92-now-available/)and run a route to the NA Server: 104.160.131.1.  Run it for a few minutes to get an accurate reading.

In the meantime, grab our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to make sure that your firewall settings are configured properly.  

Let me know the results!
